mType.description: IQMESH Network management - Bond Node Local request.

msgId.description: Message identification for binding request with response.

repeat.description: Number of repetitions of DPA messages.

deviceAddr.description: Address to bond the device to.

bondingMask.description: See IQRF OS User's and Reference guides (remote bonding, function bondNewNode).

bondingTestRetries.description: Maximum number of FRCs used to test whether the [N] was successfully bonded. If the [N] does not respond, it is unbonded at the Coordinator’s side. If the value is 0, then no test is performed. If the [N] is connected to and bonded from DSM then this testing never succeeds.

returnVerbose.description: Flag that includes additional parameters in the response.
